mapper.sql: id AS id, user_id AS userId, push_msg_id AS pushMsgId, gmt_datetime AS gmtDatetime, upt_datetime AS uptDatetime
mapper.select: SELECT push_msg_record.id AS id ,push_msg.title AS title ,push_msg.content AS content,push_msg_record.gmt_datetime AS time FROM push_msg_record LEFT JOIN push_msg ON push_msg_record.push_msg_id = push_msg.id WHERE push_msg_record.user_id = #{userId}
